issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/hawaii-maui-honolulu-grill-explosion-b2702631.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.independent.co.uk%2Fnews%2Fworld%2Famericas%2Fhawaii-maui-honolulu-grill-explosion-b2702631.html) ### Comment > Notification prompt approx. 5sec after loading the page after its cookies have been emptied. > > I propose: > ``` > independent.co.uk,indy100.com##.notification-prompt > independent.co.uk,indy100.com##.notification-prompt--show > ``` > > It can't be fixed by blocking-rules alone. Trust me, I've tried.

comment.body:
I was eventually able to find the (most likely) cause of the situation based on your response, which was that `||appboycdn.com^$third-party` (which fixes it) is in EasyPrivacy and AdGuard Tracking Protection, but was not in any anti-annoyances lists that I knew of.

I guess `||appboycdn.com^$third-party` could be added to AdGuard Popups Filter alongside the existing entry in AdGuard Tracking Protection, I suppose.
